HomePage.title: PDFuck - Free Online PDF Tools
HomePage.description: Free browser-based PDF tools. Merge, split, compress, rotate, convert PDFs. 100% privacy - files never leave your device.

hero.title: Free Online PDF Tools
hero.subtitle: Merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, and edit PDF files directly in your browser. No uploads, no registration, 100% private.
hero.privacy: Your files never leave your device - all processing happens locally in your browser.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Process PDFs instantly in your browser without waiting for uploads or downloads.

secure.title: 100% Private
secure.description: Your files are processed locally and never uploaded to any server.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All tools are free to use with no hidden fees or subscriptions.

tools.title: All PDF Tools
tools.subtitle: Choose from our collection of 10+ free PDF tools to handle any task.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your PDF tasks done in three simple steps

step1.title: Select Tool
step1.description: Choose the PDF tool that fits your needs from our collection.

step2.title: Upload Files
step2.description: Drag and drop your files or click to browse. Files stay on your device.

step3.title: Download Result
step3.description: Process your files and download the result instantly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our PDF tools

item-1.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-1.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser using JavaScript. Your files never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.

item-2.question: Is there a file size limit?
item-2.answer: Files up to 100MB are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory and device capabilities.

item-3.question: Are the tools really free?
item-3.answer: Yes, all PDF tools are completely free to use with no registration, no watermarks, and no limitations.

item-4.question: Will the quality of my PDFs be affected?
item-4.answer: No, our tools preserve the original quality of your PDFs. Operations like merging, splitting, and rotating are lossless.

item-5.question: What browsers are supported?
item-5.answer: Our tools work in all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Make sure your browser is up to date for the best experience.

ToolsPage.title: PDF Tools
ToolsPage.description: Free online PDF tools to merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, and edit PDF files. All processing happens in your browser.
ToolsPage.metaTitle: Free Online PDF Tools - Merge, Split, Compress & More
ToolsPage.metaDescription: Free browser-based PDF tools. Merge, split, compress, rotate PDFs. Convert PDF to images and images to PDF. No uploads - 100% private.

hero.title: Free Online PDF Tools
hero.subtitle: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

dropzone.title: Drop your files here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
dropzone.hint: Files are processed locally in your browser

common.privacy: Your files are processed locally and never uploaded to any server.

mergePdf.name: Merge PDF
mergePdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
mergePdf.metaTitle: Merge PDF Files Online Free - PDF Combiner
mergePdf.metaDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into one document for free. Drag and drop to reorder. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
mergePdf.longDescription: Combine multiple PDF documents into a single file quickly and easily. Drag and drop your PDF files, arrange them in your preferred order, and merge. All processing happens locally in your browser.

item-1.question: How many PDF files can I merge at once?
item-1.answer: There is no hard limit on the number of files. However, very large files may take longer to process depending on your device's memory.

item-2.question: Will merging reduce the quality of my PDFs?
item-2.answer: No. The merge operation preserves the original quality of all pages. No recompression or quality loss occurs.

item-3.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-3.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages before merging?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can drag and drop files to change their order before merging them into a single PDF.

item-5.question: What is the maximum file size?
item-5.answer: Files up to 100MB each are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory.

item-1.title: Combining Business Reports
item-1.description: Merge monthly reports, financial statements, and appendices into a single comprehensive document.

item-2.title: Assembling Applications
item-2.description: Combine cover letters, resumes, transcripts, and certificates into one application PDF.

item-3.title: Creating Course Materials
item-3.description: Merge lecture slides, reading materials, and assignments into unified course packets.

item-4.title: Archiving Documents
item-4.description: Combine related documents into organized archive files for long-term storage.

splitPdf.name: Split PDF
splitPdf.description: Separate a PDF into individual pages or custom ranges.
splitPdf.metaTitle: Split PDF Online Free - Extract PDF Pages
splitPdf.metaDescription: Split PDF files into individual pages or custom page ranges for free. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
splitPdf.longDescription: Split a PDF document into individual pages or extract specific page ranges. Select which pages you want to extract, and download them as separate PDF files.

item-1.question: Can I split a PDF into individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can split a PDF into individual single-page files or define custom page ranges.

item-2.question: Can I extract specific pages from a PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Select the exact pages or page ranges you want to extract from the original document.

item-3.question: Will splitting affect the page quality?
item-3.answer: No. Each extracted page maintains the original quality and formatting.

item-4.question: How do I define custom page ranges?
item-4.answer: Enter page ranges like '1-3, 5, 7-9' to extract those specific pages into separate files.

item-5.question: Is there a page limit?
item-5.answer: No fixed limit. The tool can handle large PDFs, limited only by your browser's memory.

item-1.title: Extracting Specific Chapters
item-1.description: Pull individual chapters from a large document for focused reading or sharing.

item-2.title: Removing Unwanted Pages
item-2.description: Extract only the pages you need, effectively removing unwanted content.

item-3.title: Creating Handouts
item-3.description: Extract specific slides or pages from presentations to create focused handouts.

item-4.title: Breaking Down Large Documents
item-4.description: Split lengthy reports into manageable sections for easier distribution.

compressPdf.name: Compress PDF
compressPdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while preserving quality.
compressPdf.metaTitle: Compress PDF Online Free - Reduce PDF File Size
compressPdf.metaDescription: Compress PDF files to reduce file size for free. Optimize PDFs for email and web. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
compressPdf.longDescription: Reduce the file size of your PDF documents by removing unused objects and optimizing the document structure. Perfect for making PDFs easier to share via email or upload to websites.

item-1.question: How much can my PDF be compressed?
item-1.answer: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with large embedded images see the most reduction.

item-2.question: Will compression reduce the visual quality?
item-2.answer: The optimization focuses on removing unused objects and streamlining the file structure. Visual quality is preserved.

item-3.question: Can I compress multiple PDFs at once?
item-3.answer: Currently, you can compress one PDF at a time. Process each file individually for best results.

item-4.question: What if the compressed file is the same size?
item-4.answer: If the PDF is already optimized, compression may not reduce the size significantly. The tool will show you the before and after sizes.

item-5.question: Is the compression lossless?
item-5.answer: Yes. The compression removes redundant data without affecting the visible content of the document.

item-1.title: Email Attachments
item-1.description: Reduce PDF size to meet email attachment limits and send documents more easily.

item-2.title: Web Upload
item-2.description: Optimize PDFs for faster upload and download on websites and online forms.

item-3.title: Storage Optimization
item-3.description: Reduce the storage space needed for large PDF archives.

item-4.title: Faster Sharing
item-4.description: Smaller files transfer faster through messaging apps and file sharing services.

rotatePdf.name: Rotate PDF
rotatePdf.description: Rotate PDF pages to the correct orientation.
rotatePdf.metaDescription: Rotate PDF pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for free. Fix page orientation easily. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
rotatePdf.longDescription: Rotate individual pages or all pages in your PDF document. Fix incorrectly oriented pages by rotating them 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Preview each page before applying changes.

item-1.question: Can I rotate individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can rotate each page independently or apply the same rotation to all pages at once.

item-2.question: What rotation angles are supported?
item-2.answer: You can rotate pages by 90¬∞ (clockwise), 180¬∞, or 270¬∞ (counter-clockwise).

item-3.question: Will rotation affect the content quality?
item-3.answer: No. Rotation only changes the page orientation without any effect on content quality.

item-4.question: Can I preview pages before rotating?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can see thumbnails of all pages and preview the rotation before applying it.

item-5.question: Can I undo a rotation?
item-5.answer: Yes. Simply rotate the page again to return it to the original orientation, or start over.

item-1.title: Fixing Scanned Documents
item-1.description: Correct the orientation of scanned pages that were fed in the wrong direction.

item-2.title: Landscape to Portrait
item-2.description: Rotate landscape pages to portrait orientation or vice versa for consistent formatting.

item-3.title: Presentation Preparation
item-3.description: Ensure all pages in a document are oriented correctly before presenting or printing.

item-4.title: Mixed Orientation Documents
item-4.description: Fix documents where some pages are rotated differently from others.

pdfToImages.name: PDF to Images
pdfToImages.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG or PNG images.
pdfToImages.metaTitle: Convert PDF to Images Online Free - PDF to JPG/PNG
pdfToImages.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to JPG or PNG images for free. Choose quality and format. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToImages.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into high-quality JPG or PNG images. Adjust the output quality and resolution to meet your needs. Perfect for sharing individual pages as images.

item-1.question: What image formats are supported?
item-1.answer: You can convert PDF pages to JPG (JPEG) or PNG format.

item-2.question: Can I adjust the image quality?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can choose the output quality from low to high, and adjust the resolution scale.

item-3.question: Can I convert specific pages only?
item-3.answer: Yes. You can select which pages to convert rather than converting the entire document.

item-4.question: What resolution will the images be?
item-4.answer: The default is 2x scale (144 DPI). You can increase or decrease the scale for higher or lower resolution.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page will be converted to a separate image file that you can download individually.

item-1.title: Social Media Sharing
item-1.description: Convert PDF content to images for posting on social media platforms.

item-2.title: Presentation Slides
item-2.description: Extract pages as images to include in presentations or other documents.

item-3.title: Website Content
item-3.description: Convert PDF pages to images for use on websites and blogs.

item-4.title: Preview Generation
item-4.description: Create image previews of PDF documents for quick viewing.

imagesToPdf.name: Images to PDF
imagesToPdf.description: Convert JPG, PNG, or WebP images to a PDF document.
imagesToPdf.metaTitle: Convert Images to PDF Online Free - JPG/PNG to PDF
imagesToPdf.metaDescription: Convert JPG, PNG, and WebP images to PDF for free. Arrange images and create PDFs. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
imagesToPdf.longDescription: Convert your images into a PDF document. Upload multiple JPG, PNG, or WebP images, arrange them in the desired order, and combine them into a single PDF file.

item-1.question: What image formats are supported?
item-1.answer: JPG (JPEG), PNG, and WebP images are supported.

item-2.question: Can I reorder images before converting?
item-2.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange images in your preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-3.question: Will the image quality be preserved?
item-3.answer: Yes. Images are embedded at their original resolution in the PDF document.

item-4.question: How many images can I convert at once?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images you can process depends on your device's memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
item-5.answer: Each page is sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding image.

item-1.title: Photo Albums
item-1.description: Combine photos into a single PDF for easy sharing and printing.

item-2.title: Document Scanning
item-2.description: Convert scanned images into a organized PDF document.

item-3.title: Portfolio Creation
item-3.description: Compile design work or artwork images into a professional PDF portfolio.

item-4.title: Receipt Collection
item-4.description: Combine photos of receipts into a single PDF for expense reporting.

watermarkPdf.name: Add Watermark
watermarkPdf.description: Add text watermarks to your PDF documents.
watermarkPdf.metaTitle: Add Watermark to PDF Online Free
watermarkPdf.metaDescription: Add text watermarks to PDF documents for free. Customize text, size, color, and position. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
watermarkPdf.longDescription: Add custom text watermarks to your PDF documents. Configure the watermark text, font size, color, opacity, rotation, and position. Apply watermarks to all pages at once.

item-1.question: Can I customize the watermark appearance?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can adjust the text, font size, color, opacity, rotation angle, and position.

item-2.question: Is the watermark applied to all pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. The watermark is applied uniformly to every page in the document.

item-3.question: Can I add image watermarks?
item-3.answer: Currently, only text watermarks are supported. Image watermark support may be added in the future.

item-4.question: Can I remove a watermark after adding it?
item-4.answer: The watermark is permanently embedded in the new PDF. Keep your original file if you may need the unwatermarked version.

item-5.question: Will the watermark cover the existing content?
item-5.answer: You can adjust the opacity to make the watermark semi-transparent so it doesn't obscure the underlying content.

item-1.title: Protecting Drafts
item-1.description: Add 'DRAFT' watermarks to documents that are not yet finalized.

item-2.title: Confidential Documents
item-2.description: Mark sensitive documents with 'CONFIDENTIAL' watermarks to indicate restricted access.

item-3.title: Branding
item-3.description: Add your company name or logo text as a watermark to branded documents.

item-4.title: Copyright Protection
item-4.description: Add copyright notices to protect your original content from unauthorized use.

pageNumbers.name: Add Page Numbers
pageNumbers.description: Add page numbers to your PDF documents.
pageNumbers.metaTitle: Add Page Numbers to PDF Online Free
pageNumbers.metaDescription: Add page numbers to PDF documents for free. Choose position, format, and starting number. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pageNumbers.longDescription: Add page numbers to your PDF documents with full control over position, format, and styling. Choose from numeric, Roman numeral, or 'Page X of Y' formats. Place numbers at any corner or center position.

item-1.question: What number formats are available?
item-1.answer: You can choose from numeric (1, 2, 3), Roman numerals (I, II, III), or 'Page X of Y' format.

item-2.question: Can I choose where the numbers appear?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can place page numbers at the top or bottom of the page, aligned left, center, or right.

item-3.question: Can I start from a number other than 1?
item-3.answer: Yes. You can set any starting page number.

item-4.question: Will page numbers overlap existing content?
item-4.answer: Page numbers are placed in the margin area. For best results, ensure your document has sufficient margins.

item-5.question: Can I skip numbering on certain pages?
item-5.answer: Currently, page numbers are added to all pages. You can use the extract tool to separate pages if needed.

item-1.title: Academic Papers
item-1.description: Add proper page numbering to academic papers and theses.

item-2.title: Legal Documents
item-2.description: Number pages in legal documents for reference and indexing.

item-3.title: Manuals and Guides
item-3.description: Add page numbers to user manuals and instruction guides for easy navigation.

item-4.title: Book Manuscripts
item-4.description: Add professional page numbering to book manuscripts before submission.

reorderPages.name: Reorder Pages
reorderPages.description: Drag and drop to rearrange PDF pages.
reorderPages.metaDescription: Rearrange PDF pages by dragging and dropping for free. Reorder pages visually. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
reorderPages.longDescription: Rearrange the pages in your PDF document by dragging and dropping page thumbnails. See a visual preview of each page and easily move them to create your desired page order.

item-1.question: How do I reorder pages?
item-1.answer: Simply drag and drop the page thumbnails to rearrange them in your desired order.

item-2.question: Can I see page previews?
item-2.answer: Yes. Each page is shown as a thumbnail so you can easily identify and arrange pages.

item-3.question: Will reordering affect page content?
item-3.answer: No. Only the order of pages changes. The content of each page remains identical.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages in a large PDF?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool supports large PDFs, though generating thumbnails for many pages may take a moment.

item-5.question: Can I also delete pages while reordering?
item-5.answer: For deleting pages, use the Extract Pages tool where you can select only the pages you want to keep.

item-1.title: Fixing Page Order
item-1.description: Correct documents where pages were scanned or added in the wrong order.

item-2.title: Custom Presentations
item-2.description: Rearrange presentation slides to create a custom flow for different audiences.

item-3.title: Document Reorganization
item-3.description: Move sections around in reports and documents to improve logical flow.

item-4.title: Priority Ordering
item-4.description: Move the most important pages to the front of a document.

extractPages.name: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Select and extract specific pages from a PDF.
extractPages.metaDescription: Extract specific pages from PDF documents for free. Select pages visually and download. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
extractPages.longDescription: Extract specific pages from your PDF document. View page thumbnails, select the pages you want to keep, and create a new PDF containing only those pages.

item-1.question: How do I select pages to extract?
item-1.answer: Click on page thumbnails to select or deselect them. Selected pages will be highlighted.

item-2.question: Can I extract non-consecutive pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can select any combination of pages, whether consecutive or scattered throughout the document.

item-3.question: Will extracted pages keep their formatting?
item-3.answer: Yes. Each extracted page maintains its original formatting, images, and text.

item-4.question: Can I extract pages from a protected PDF?
item-4.answer: This depends on the type of protection. Some encrypted PDFs may not be processable in the browser.

item-5.question: Is there a limit on the number of pages I can extract?
item-5.answer: No. You can extract as many pages as you want from the original document.

item-1.title: Selecting Key Pages
item-1.description: Extract only the most important pages from a lengthy document.

item-2.title: Creating Summaries
item-2.description: Pull out summary or conclusion pages from reports for quick review.

item-3.title: Removing Sensitive Content
item-3.description: Create a version of a document without confidential pages for sharing.

item-4.title: Building Custom Documents
item-4.description: Extract pages from multiple documents to compile a custom reference.
